channel.title: ROKU on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in ROKU on FinanClub

item.title: 1033 ROKU
item.description: score:1033 Chances: Roku’s second-quarter results exceeded Wall Street estimates by a huge margin, indicating strong performance. The current price-to-sales (P/S) multiple of 4.2 is much lower than Roku’s historical average of 10.7, suggesting potential growth. The ad market could be showing signs of recovery, which could benefit Roku’s revenue growth.
